page.prototype: .FindSheet as L (Sheet as Office::Spreadsheet, Name as C)

argument.name: Sheet
argument.description: An Office::Spreadsheet variable that will be populated with the spreadsheet with the specified name.

argument.name: Name
argument.description: The name of the sheet to find.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns *[xb:.T.]* if operation succeeds, otherwise *[xb:.F.]*. The Office::Excel2003Document CallResult object will contain additional information if the operation fails.
